Destroys the context and the
regl context associated with it.

'use strict'

/**
 * Module exports.
 */

name: src/math/quaternion.js
computeEuler
description:
Helper function to compute euler angles from
a given quaternion.

name: src/math/vector.js
ref
description:
Returns a reference to the underlying
vector elements.

name: componentLength
description: Returns the component count of the vector

name: toArray
description:
Converts the vector into
a normal Array.

name: valueOf
description:
Returns the underlying vector
array value.

name: src/mesh.js
src/object3d.js
src/stats.js
src/texture.js
src/utils.js
isDOMElementInViewport
description:
Predicate function to determine if a given DOM
element is in the window's viewport.

name: getScreenOrientation
description:
Returns the screen orientation angle.
Borrowed from https://github.com/hawksley/eleVR-Web-Player/blob/master/lib/util.js

name: nearestPowerOfTwo
description:
Finds the nearest power of two for a
given number value.

name: makePowerOfTwo
description:
Convert an image or canvas to the nearest power
of two.
Borrowed from https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/blob/dev/src/renderers/webgl/WebGLTextures.js

name: scaleWithCanvas
description:
Scale image using a canvas.
Warning: Scaling through the canvas will only work with
images that use premultiplied alpha.

Borrowed from https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/blob/dev/src/renderers/webgl/WebGLTextures.js

name: clampToMaxSize
description: Clamp an image to a max size.
